  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/524</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/524</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Catalunya: situació medioambiental</string>
            <string language="en">Catalonia: environmental situations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalonien: Klimasituationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Catalogne : situations environnementales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Catalonia: situações ambientais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Catalogna: situazioni ambientali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλωνία: περιβαλλοντικές καταστάσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs multimèdia sobre les causes i efectes dels impactes ambientals a Catalunya en la dècada dels 90. Conté quatre apartats: biosfera, hidrosfera, atmosfera i energia elèctrica. 1r premi (ESO) del 6è concurs de webs de ciència.</string>
            <string language="en">Multimedia resource on the causes and effects of environmental impacts in Catalonia in the '90s: biosphere, hydrosphere, atmosphere and electrical energy. First prize (secondary schools) in the 6th science webpage competition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la terra</string>
            <string language="en">earth sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medi ambient</string>
            <string language="en">environment</string>
            <string language="es">medio ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació medi ambiental</string>
            <string language="en">environmental education</string>
            <string language="es">educación ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">natural sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">contaminació</string>
            <string language="en">pollution</string>
            <string language="es">contaminación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gestió de residus</string>
            <string language="en">waste management</string>
            <string language="es">gestión de residuos</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multimediahilfsmittel auf den Ursachen und den 
Effekten von Klimaauswirkungen in Katalonien im ' 90s: 
Biosphäre, Hydrosphere, Atmosphäre und elektrische Energie. 
Erster Preis (Sekundärschulen) in der 6. Wissenschaft Webseite 
Konkurrenz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource de multimédia sur les causes et les 
effets des incidences sur l'environnement en Catalogne dans le '90s : 
biosphère, hydrosphère, atmosphère et énergie électrique. 
Premier prix (écoles secondaires) en 6ème concurrence de 
page Web de la science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso dos multimedia nas causas e nos efeitos de 
impactos ambientais em Catalonia ' no 90s: biosphere, 
hydrosphere, atmosfera e energia elétrica. Primeiro prêmio 
(escolas secundárias) na ã competição do Web page da ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa di multimedia sulle cause e sugli effetti 
degli impatti ambientali in Catalogna 'nel 90s: biosfera, 
hydrosphere, atmosfera ed energia elettrica. Primo premio 
(scuole secondarie) nella sesta concorrenza di Web page di scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς πολυμέσων στα αίτια και τα 
αιτιατά των περιβαλλοντικών επιδράσεων στην Καταλωνία στη 
"δεκαετία του '90: βιόσφαιρα, υδρόσφαιρα, ατμόσφαιρα και 
ηλεκτρική ενέργεια. Πρώτο βραβείο (δευτεροβάθμια 
εκπαίδευση) στον 6ο ανταγωνισμό webpage επιστήμης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geowissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürliche Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
